msg_greetings: The bot is loaded and ready for actions.
msg_api_received: Received a message using the API.
msg_api_success: The API has been configured. Running on %s
msg_discord_failure: Discord token is not present, Discord Integration is not activated.
msg_discord_success: The discord integration was successfully configured.
msg_discord_token_not_present: The discord token is not present. Discord Integration is not activated
msg_discord_token_failure: The discord token is invalid. Discord Integration is not activated.
msg_discord_token_success: The discord token is valid, commencing login process.
msg_discord_request_channel_id: Please insert the discord channel in .env file.
msg_discord_channel_success: The discord channel has been successfully cached.
msg_env_failure: The env reader has failed, please check the .env file.
msg_env_success: The env reader has successfully loaded variables.
msg_credentials_failure: The credentials are invalid. Please insert valid credentials.
msg_finder_block_success: The finder process cannot find the block %s
msg_finder_block_failure: The finder process cannot find anymore of %s, commencing deposit process.
msg_finder_chest_success: The chest has been successfully spotted.
msg_finder_chest_failure: Could not find the chest mentioned in the environmental variable.
msg_finder_player_failure: The bot cannot find you, please check the render distance.
msg_finder_bed_success: The finder process was able to find a bed.
msg_finder_bed_failure: The finder process was unable to find a bed.
msg_miner_start_success: The mining process has been successfully started.
msg_miner_start_failure: The mining process had an unexpected error.
msg_miner_stopped: The mining process has been stopped.
msg_miner_already_started: The mining process has already been started.
msg_interface_inventory_success: Web Inventory Viewer has started successfully.
msg_interface_inventory_failure: Web Inventory Viewer has failed unexpectedly.
msg_plugins_failure: The plugin loader has failed unexpectedly.
msg_plugins_success: The plugin loader has successfully loaded plugins.
msg_command_unauthorized: The bot has denied a command from an unauthorized user.
msg_command_blacklisted: The bot has denied a command from a blacklisted user.
msg_sleeper_commence: The bot has started the sleeping process.
msg_sleeper_failure: The bot was unable to sleep.
msg_sleeper_day: The bot cannot sleep at day.
msg_sleeper_monsters: The bot cannot sleep while monsters are nearby.
